abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.p: The “ coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID‐19)” outbreak was first reported in December 2019 (China). Since then, this disease has rapidly spread across the globe and in March 2020 the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the COVID‐19 pandemic. 1 Since the outbreak was first announced, our journal has extensively focused on the clinical features, outcomes, diagnosis, immunology, and pathogenesis of COVID‐19 and its infectious agent severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS‐CoV‐2).
